channel.title: Eps on Rice, Spice, and Whine Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in Eps on Rice, Spice, and Whine Podcast

item.title: 12: He Study and Protecc
item.description: In this episode, we censor the nasty, Kellen gets a phone call, and Eric cures asthma.

item.title: 11: Opener
item.description: In this episode, we get back into the swing of things for season 2 of Rice, Spice, and Whine: In The Box.

item.title: 10: Slavs
item.description: In this episode, we talk about spending human capital, and Eric tells a super long story.

item.title: 9: Lying
item.description: In this episode we talk about lying and social contracts.

item.title: 8: Identity
item.description: In this episode we talk about what makes up identity, and whether our appearances can be considered deceptive.

item.title: 7: Changes
item.description: We talk about whether you can truly change who you are. Does it really matter? You decide.

item.title: 6: GoodPeeps
item.description: The boys try to turn things positive. What quality makes a person “good”?

item.title: 5: Habits
item.description: We talk about forming habits, habitual behaviors, and whether we should change them.

item.title: 4: Gratitude
item.description: We discuss what it means to be grateful, and Eric makes a promise to Ianâ€™s mom.

item.title: 3: Impressionable
item.description: We tried to not be judgy. We failed.

item.title: 2: Super Sabbath
item.description: We talk about how we spend our free time.

item.title: 0: Open
item.description: The pilot episode of the podcast in which Eric dutifuly asks: “Do we have an audience?” Our first discussion on things we know little about.
